text:
Hi All,

one more question. I am modifying logitcrossentropy and softmax to support second order gradients, as I am interested with structured prediction with NNs. Should I keep this changes private, or try to put them somewehere, possibly NNlib.

elements.text:
Hi All,

one more question. I am modifying logitcrossentropy and softmax to support second order gradients, as I am interested with structured prediction with NNs. Should I keep this changes private, or try to put them somewehere, possibly NNlib.

text: I think this really isn’t sorted out yet, but might be fun to have some test cases to look at if you are building things. I don’t see why NNlib shouldn’t have (say) gradient definitions for its gradient definitions, if that ends up being how this works…
